Text: Harrogate Rugby Union Football Club is an English rugby union team based in Harrogate, North Yorkshire.
Triplets:<Harrogate Rugby Union Football Club

Text: Harrogate RUFC:  The club runs three senior sides.
Triplets:<Harrogate RUFC

<Text: Harrogate RUFC:  The first team play in North Premier, having been relegated from National League 2 North in 2016–17.>
Triplets:<Harrogate RUFC
5:
--------------------
Text: Harrogate RUFC:  The club also fields a ladies team (Harrogate Ladies) in the Women's National Challenge (NC) North 2 East league, and ten junior teams (from ages 6 to 16).
